name: Rewind Bullethell Web Version
description:
The Web GL version of a game made for Brackeys REWIND Game Jame (2020.2) (exact same game, just in Web GL mode instead of .exe)

Play as a lone space ranger under attack by a group of space bandits. Unfortunately your weapon systems are malfunctioning! The only systems you have are your Amplifiers and your Time Distortion Drive (aka your Rewinder)!

>Amplify the bullets by passing them through your Amplifier beams to give them enough strength to penetrate the enemy shields. 

>Dodge the enemy bullets until your Rewind ability is available. 

>Use Rewind to turn the tables on the enemy, sending their (hopefully amplified) bullets back at them! Be sure to dodge the returning bullets too!

Enjoy! :)
